refnamediv.refpurpose: adjust the local UNIX clock, once

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: clockadd reads a TAI64NA time adjustment. It then adds that adjustment to the local UNIX clock.
The adjustment must be a single 16-byte packet.
clockadd must be run by root.

refsection.title: History
refsection.para: clockadd was originally part of DanielJ.Bernstein's clockspeed toolset in 1998.

refsection.title: Author
refsection.para: Original code and documentation by DanielJ.Bernstein. Documentation modernizations by Jonathande Boyne Pollard.
